content:
hey all, I have a PR adding some docs on how integrating ISLE with cranelift works, and should hopefully be helpful for anyone wanting to start helping with porting hand-written lowering code over to ISLE. feel free to drop suggestions/questions/etc in the PR! thanks :)

https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/3556

Add a document describing how ISLE is integrated with Cranelift by fitzgen 路 Pull Request #3556 路 bytecodealliance/wasmtime
Have a question about this project? Sign up for a free GitHub account to open an issue and contact its maintainers and the community.
